attributes.action: make it easier to sign these e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Few people are going to bother re-typing their address for each petition that they sign. Hence petition signing will be in the hands of a minority. Make this site operate like most others on the internet by use of cookies, which will also then allow it to be possible to recognise previously viewed petitions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
